description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The computer management system has been damaged. The system is outputting random security sequences, can you successfully re-enter the sequence to continue control of operations, or successfully override any fatal errors? See how long you can survive in this pattern matching game. Challenge your friends in multi-player, and compete on the global score boards with your Xbox live gold membership.
